ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed low fat cream of chicken and herbs soup
1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips
des: "This is super easy and very tasty. You can make more or less; I usually feed my family of 4. My husband who doesn't like chicken says he would eat this every night without complaint."
ins:
Combine soup, mushroom pieces, onion, chicken, and wine in slow cooker.
Cook on Low setting for 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
